metadata.title: CVE-2018-14337 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The CHECK macro in mrbgems/mruby-sprintf/src/sprintf.c in mruby 1.4.1contains a signed integer overflow, possibly leading to out-of-boundsmemory access because the mrb_str_resize function in string.c does notcheck for a negative length.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
